objects.text:
Digital Control Panel with LED Display
Multiple Drying Cycles & Heat Settings
Energy-Efficient Ventless Technology
Perfect for Apartments 
& Small Homes

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Digital Control
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive control panel
• 🔄 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Towels
• 📱 LED digital display showing time remaining and cycle status
• 🌡️ Advanced temperature control with various heat settings
• 🚪 Large capacity drum with spacious door opening for easy loading/unloading
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and built-in cleaning reminder
• 📏 Space-saving compact design perfect for apartments and small homes
• 🔊 Sound alert when cycle completes
• ⚙️ Multiple fabric care options with adjustable drying preferences

banner_details:
The banner features a modern promotional layout designed to market a home appliance. It includes a bold, eye-catching promotional message using a large headline (`tagline`) in a vibrant red, paired with a secondary heading (`heading`) in dark navy for additional emphasis. A cluster of informative bullet points (`description`) highlights key product benefits in a readable font on the left side. A prominent price (`price`) is emphasized with a bold red color, paired with a smaller promotional subheading (`subheading`). A clear call-to-action button (`cta_button_background` with `cta`) in blue encourages immediate engagement. The showcased product image (`product_image`) is featured on the right, offering visual context. Subtle layered backgrounds and curved stroke elements add design depth and a friendly aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Red: `#E74C3C`
- Navy/Dark Blue: `#2C3E50`
- Steel Blue: `#34495E`
- Light Blue: `#3498DB`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Background Tone: `#F5F7FA`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern front-load dryer with a refined monochrome aesthetic. The dominant color is a clean **pure white (#FFFFFF)** that conveys freshness and cleanliness—ideal traits for a home appliance. The large circular door is accented in **deep black (#1C1C1C)**, creating a strong contrast that highlights the main functional component. Subtly integrated is a **glossy charcoal gray (#3A3A3A)** in the control dial and digital panel, adding a tech-savvy appeal. Small pops of **light blue (#7EC8E3)**, **steel silver (#C0C0C0)**, and **soft red (#FF6F61)** on the control labels subtly guide user attention and add vibrancy without overpowering the minimalist design.
